        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="53641" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="53641" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.28</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="5902">5,902</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="862"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Oud for Greatness</b> by <b>Initio Parfums Prives</b> is a fragrance for women and men. <b>Oud for Greatness</b> was launched in 2018. Top notes are Saffron, Nutmeg and Lavender; middle note is Agarwood (Oud); base notes are Patchouli and Musk. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this </fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="53641"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.55.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Saffron-55.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Saffron</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.9193135460834; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.59.jpg" style="width: 3.425rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Nutmeg-59.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Nutmeg</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.84529946162075; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.1.jpg" style="width: 3rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Lavender-1.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Lavender</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.114.jpg" style="width: 4.975rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Agarwood-Oud--114.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Agarwood (Oud)</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.80477139066561; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.34.jpg" style="width: 2.8rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Patchouli-34.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Patchouli</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.4.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Musk-4.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Musk</div></div></div>

    <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/news/en/13096/news.13096-120x120.jpg" alt="The Best Fragrances of 2019" style="margin-right: 1em; flex-shrink: 0">    <div class="flex-child-auto">
        <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/news/The-Best-Fragrances-of-2019-13096.html">
            <span class="clickcatcher"></span><h4>The Best Fragrances of 2019</h4>
        </a>
        <p>by <i>Elena Knezevic</i></p>
        <div class="right-bottom-corner-abs">            12/20/19 23:24
                    </div>
    </div>

    <span class="badge">54</span>
</div>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><longevity-rating :perfume_id="53641"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume longevity:<span>4.34</span> out of<span>5</span>.</p></longevity-rating></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><sillage-rating :perfume_id="53641"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume sillage:<span>3.13</span> out of<span>4</span>.</p></sillage-rating></div><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__728x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4" v-pre>
</div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="strike-title"><span><small>Collections</small> Black Gold</span></div><div class="carousel"><div class="carousel-cell"><a href="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Happiness-69224.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.69224.jpg"alt="Oud for Happiness Initio Parfums Prives" width="125" height="140"><span class="brand">Initio Parfums Prives</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">Oud for Happiness</span></a></div><div class="carousel-cell"><a href="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-Neo-93090.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.93090.jpg"alt="Oud for Greatness Neo Initio Parfums Prives" width="125" height="140"><span class="brand">Initio Parfums Prives</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">Oud for Greatness Neo</span></a></div><div class="carousel-cell"><a href="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-Hair-Perfume-96605.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.96605.jpg"alt="Oud for Greatness Hair Perfume Initio Parfums Prives" width="125" height="140"><span class="brand">Initio Parfums Prives</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">Oud for Greatness Hair Perfume</span></a></div></div><carousel-perfumes></carousel-perfumes></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><gender-widget :perfume_id="53641"></gender-widget></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><price-value-widget :perfume_id="53641"></price-value-widget></div></div></div><div class="cell small-12"><similar-perfumes :perfume_id="53641" title="This perfume reminds me of"><div class="strike-title">

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2370090" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2370090" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kalysto_Sheik"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1553592"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1553592.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kalysto_Sheik" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Les-Absolus-d-Orient-Epices-Exquises-74816.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74816.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Les Absolus d'Orient pices Exquises"title="Les Absolus d'Orient pices Exquises"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2370090ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2370090" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1553592">Kalysto_Sheik</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-03">12/03/24 21:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A unique and well crafted perfume. I've got to say the spiciness of it reminds me so much of ganymede marc antoine barrois, specially in the dry down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2370090"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2370090#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2356276" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2356276" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Puricifer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2289132"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2289132.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Puricifer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2356276ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2356276" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); It smells somewhat like scented candles burning. Picture this : You and your girlfriend is on a date at a Michelin restaurant, you both chew on your nicely cooked steak as the candle by the window burns lightly and fills the entire restaurant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2355886" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MustafaJ"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1783173"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1783173.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MustafaJ" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2355886ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2355886" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1783173">MustafaJ</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-20">11/20/24 18:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have smelled many good perfumes, and out of all of them, this one earns the description "majestic". It really does convey power, luxury and regalness. <br />
<br />
The Lattafa clone may be good enough to scratch the itch, but trust me, the quality of ingredients and strength of performance of the original has no substitute.<br />
<br />
10/10 perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2355886"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2355886#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2349977" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; One of the best from the house and a DNA I really enjoy (I am also a massive fan of Haltane which I plan to give a separate review).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2349977"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2349977#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

</div></div><div id="parent2349752" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2349752" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="UltraSigmaAuraMaxxer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2303823"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2303823.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="UltraSigmaAuraMaxxer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2349752ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2349752" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); It is very strong coming out of the bottle buy it only lasts 3-5 hours. NOT WORTH IT</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2349752"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2349752#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2348133" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2348133" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MorphoMetasis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2125015"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2125015.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MorphoMetasis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Bade-e-Al-Oud-Amethyst-68214.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68214.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bade'e Al Oud Amethyst"title="Bade'e Al Oud Amethyst"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2348133ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2348133" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2125015">MorphoMetasis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-13">11/13/24 18:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought Oud for Glory after getting a decant of Oud for Greatness and balking at the idea of spending over a couple hundred on it.<br />
So I've been wearing the Lataffa for several months, and thought it did a pretty decent job of replicating Oud for Greatness.<br />
Today I decided to try the decant of the OG once again, and now I'm sitting here with it as I type this thinking it may very well be worth the extra $$. It is so rich and complex compared to Oud for Glory, and it took me months of exposure to Lataffa, and stepping away from Initio, for me to come back and really appreciate what Initio has created. It has such tremendous depth that I failed to recognize initially, and I'm finding myself wondering if it might be one of the best fragrances out there. I freaking love it! </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2348133"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2348133#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2347234" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2347234" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scheherazade_x"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213492"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2213492.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scheherazade_x" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Jazz-Club-20541.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20541.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jazz Club"title="Jazz Club"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2347234ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2347234" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213492">Scheherazade_x</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-13">11/13/24 01:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Deep, dark, and delicious. Lots of nutmeg and lavender in the initial spray, then comes the woody, earthy heart. Theres an underlying hint of sweetness, but its just that - a hint. <br />
<br />
Im reminded a bit of Sauvage Elixir, but that one is a lot sweeter (to my nose, anyway). This one is quite a masculine scent, but still perfectly wearable by a woman. Its powerful and assertive, sexy and alluring. Oud for Greatness is the perfect name for it.<br />
<br />
Probably not an everyday wear for me, but lovely for winter. Projects well and lasts forever.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2347234"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2347234#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2347207" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2347207" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TupacAmaruShakur"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1646140"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1646140.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TupacAmaruShakur" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Sycomore-Eau-de-Parfum-41780.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41780.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sycomore Eau de Parfum"title="Sycomore Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2347207ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2347207" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1646140">TupacAmaruShakur</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-13">11/13/24 00:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So many ppl voting it's simular to Haltane, Haltane has that delicious praline note and goes in a very different direction, I prefer Haltane by the way. <br />
<br />
First fragrence that popped up in my head when I smelled OFG is Dior Sauvage Elixir. If you own Savage Elixir it would be redundant to buy OFG, Sauvage Elixir smells better also.<br />
<br />
1. Haltane <br />
2. Sauvage Elixir <br />
3. OFG</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2347207"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2347207#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2345970" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2345970" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tochi3008"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1876298"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1876298.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tochi3008" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2345970ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2345970" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1876298">Tochi3008</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-11">11/11/24 23:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Greatest thing I have ever smelled in my life, tasty and sweet but could be too sweet for some people</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2345970"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2345970#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2336673" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2336673" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="genevieves"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/936970"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.936970.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="genevieves" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2336673ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2336673" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/936970">genevieves</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-03">11/03/24 08:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>ROFL at the last comment XD</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2336673"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2336673#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2333589" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2333589" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Deelecto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1471201"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1471201.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Deelecto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Fragrance-Du-Bois/Secret-Tryst-Extrait-de-Parfum-72017.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72017.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Secret Tryst Extrait de Parfum"title="Secret Tryst Extrait de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2333589ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2333589" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1471201">Deelecto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-31">10/31/24 10:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A rather strong, synthetic clone of Lattafas classic Badee Al Oud.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2333589"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2333589#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2332977" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2332977" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mortarelli"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1869418"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1869418.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mortarelli" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2332977ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2332977" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1869418">Mortarelli</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-30">10/30/24 18:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance has a strong core of ISO E Super and Ambroxan (the 2 molecules from molecule 01 and molecule 02). Then layered with patchouli, nutmeg and saffron. The Lataffa dupe does smell the same upon opening but does not have the iso e super and ambroxan that this fragrance has, making it not nearly as strong or as performant. <br />
<br />
Great smell, great packaging and great bottle. Just no oud (or at least not enough to be noticeable).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2332977"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2332977#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2326213" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2326213" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Melody Valentine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747732"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Melody Valentine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Love-Don-t-Be-Shy-4322.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4322.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Love Don't Be Shy"title="Love Don't Be Shy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2326213ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2326213" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747732">Melody Valentine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-24">10/24/24 10:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just got three free samples from Initio through a Facebook ad. I've been wanting to try this for ages and was gonna just get the Lattafa clone so I'm absolutely buzzing to have some of the real one (plus Oud For Happiness and Neo) <br />
<br />
I thought it leans a touch masculine at first, but then it bounces back to being more feminine. It's strange, but I'd definitely say it lands in the middle and is fully unisex when it's finally dried down.<br />
 It's much sweeter at first, has the "Baccarat DNA" with a sugary, crystalline feel with the same sort of oud as Oud Satin Mood, same sort of medicinal, powdery scent just without the rose. Same level of oud too, not too much. It could almost be a hybrid of the two until the spices and lavender come into it. Then it dries down to something I can't really describe tbh. It smells of something but I can't think what, some sort of herb or plant. It's the lavender and nutmeg mixed with the saffron that just gives it an aromatic scent. It smells like incense sticks actually , that's what it is. Maybe even a hint of tobacco? It's the texture of tobacco and incense sticks. Now it's gone back to being really sweet, almost candy sweet like Baccarat Extrait.. The patchouli and musk aren't that noticeable until way into the dry down but I can smell them now. <br />
It's definitely not linear, it's changed multiple times since spraying it. It's beautiful, I'll say that much. I absolutely love it and wish I had a full bottle. I see why it's so popular. It smells luxurious and expensive. I'm so pleased I've got this and the others. I've kinda gone off the Baccarat DNA in general, it's so common and I know I'm way late to trying this but I think it's gorgeous, plus nobody around me wears anything like this. It's nice and strong too, I only sprayed once, coz it's only a 1.5ml sample and I don't want to use it up but I can still really smell it from my hand. If I'd sprayed a few on my skin and clothes, and it had a bigger atomiser like a bottle would, I can totally see it being beastly like people say.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2326213"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2326213#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2324776" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2324776" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Luke2008"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2296302"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Luke2008" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2324776ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2324776" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2296302">Luke2008</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-23">10/23/24 06:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Before I get into my review I would like to warn anyone looking at purchasing from the seller 'escentialperfumes' on Ebay -- Don't. Inside the bottle I purchased from them was what I can guarantee to be the Lattaffa clone.  Do not purchase from this seller or you will be let down like I was. <br />
<br />
Now to the review: <br />
<br />
I first discovered this scent when I received a sample of it from a seperate fragrance purchase and it instantly became a "WOW" scent for me. I agree that this is definitely a try before you buy type fragrance and won't suit everyone but on my skin it smells INCREDIBLE. I now have a GENUINE bottle from a different seller and it is definitely in my top 3 fragrances out of 40 plus other fragrances. <br />
<br />
The earthy/animalic vibes this scent gives is Divine to me. This is the major difference between the Lattaffa Oud for Glory clone and this Masterpiece. Granted, I have several bottles of the clone 'just in case' but for me personally it cannot beat the OG.  <br />
<br />
One spray to my neck is all I need as this is a beast of a fragrance for projection and longevity. To anyone who finds this not to be the case -- you are either noseblind to the fragrance; might not suit your skin type; or like me as mentioned above you perhaps received a fraudulent product. This is one of the strongest working fragrances I have come across - this and Sauvage Elixir.  <br />
<br />
Once again, definitely a try before you buy fragrance but if it works for you then if you are like me it will become a treasure to have in your collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2324776"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2324776#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2321246" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2321246" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="april1986"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2105353"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="april1986" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Narciso-Rodriguez/Narciso-Rodriguez-For-Her-209.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.209.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Narciso Rodriguez For Her"title="Narciso Rodriguez For Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2321246ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2321246" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2105353">april1986</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-19">10/19/24 17:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This absolutely blew me away . . . smells like an expensive luxury hotel. I really like it, but I don't think I could see myself wearing it. Still an amazing fragrance and very potent!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2321246"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2321246#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2319856" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2319856" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dissonance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2290295"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2290295.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="dissonance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/Frustration-71611.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71611.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Frustration"title="Frustration"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2319856ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2319856" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2290295">dissonance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-18">10/18/24 10:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice little BR540-ade oud, to the point where its hardly even an oud fragrance. Cant see why anybody wouldnt enjoy this, but I can see this becoming completely redundant due to the plethora of dupes available.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2319856"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2319856#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2317444" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2317444" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GabeOz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1825660"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1825660.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GabeOz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53641.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud for Greatness"title="Oud for Greatness"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2317444ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2317444" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1825660">GabeOz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-16">10/16/24 06:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Animalic oud-woody vibe..<br />
Just enough to make you noticed anywhere you go..<br />
Dont even think about wearing this scent on summer day or even during the day to be honest<br />
This is a classy and mature scent.. office safe and a great choice for a diner out with someone special..<br />
I can see myself wearing this fragrance for a close encounter hanging out kinda of thing..<br />
Its beautiful.. really really beautiful and the presentation is one of a kind..<br />
Long lasting specially if you blast on your clothes..<br />
You gotta wash at the edge of a river beating with a rock to get the smell off.. its pungently delicious..<br />
Similar to Haltane? Yes even better in my opinion..<br />
 more dry and dark Haltane have more freshness and for some reason I had to re-apply a couple of times.. <br />
However both are awesome oud base scent.. Haltane can be worn more casually in my opinion..<br />
Oud for Greatness is THE bomb!<br />
Fair price..<br />
High quality..<br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2317444"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2317444#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2310151" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2310151" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sunformiles"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2072327"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2072327.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sunformiles" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2310151ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2310151" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2072327">sunformiles</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-09">10/09/24 11:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>People don't mention enough how sweet this is. Like, overwhelmingly sweet. It's not subtle at all, even in cold weather. I absolutely love the way it smells, minus the sweet accord, but that was enough for me to not buy a bottle. I have a 10ml decant that I couldn't even finish.<br />
<br />
So the takeaway: yes, the hype is real, it's amazing, performance and projection are unreal (a 90ml bottle should outlast stone monuments eroding) but the sickly and very cloying sweetness on my skin made it a pass for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2255099">nlrashkind</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-05">10/05/24 20:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like United States money. Like you physically went to the bank, and they handed you a pile of money and you stuck your face into it. And I mean that literally, it straight up smells like an old bank. Especially if you go into the vault where everything is metal and people are probably storing all kinds of cash in the little boxes. I don't get spice factory from this at all. I get metallic bank vault, it's a distinct smell that all banks have.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2306338"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2306338#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2305707" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2301537"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2301537#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2299726" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2299726" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Noseofthedepth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2261460"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2261460.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Noseofthedepth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Interlude-Man-15294.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15294.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Interlude Man"title="Interlude Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2299726ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2299726" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2261460">Noseofthedepth</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-30">09/30/24 01:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A unique, oriental fragrance. Personally, I find it too comforting and too delicate. If initio released a harsher, more woody variant, I'd definetely fall in love with it. Overall, a refined and great scent, good for everyday use.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2299726"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2299726#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2297552" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2297552" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mezbah Sohan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1836309"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1836309.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mezbah Sohan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2297552ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2297552" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1836309">Mezbah Sohan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-28">09/28/24 00:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love of my life...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2297552"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2297552#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2296643" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2296643" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Charlie bowie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408372"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1408372.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Charlie bowie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Slumberhouse/Norne-Oil-67920.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67920.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Norne Oil"title="Norne Oil"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2296643ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2296643" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408372">Charlie bowie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-27">09/27/24 03:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In response to the reviewer before me @Eau de kev53, its absolutely okay not to like a perfume. Reviews should be about transparency and honesty, otherwise, whats the point? Finding those negative reviews can be incredibly helpful and, honestly, much appreciated. At the end of the day, fragrance is deeply subjective.<br />
<br />
Now, onto Oud for Greatness. FOR ME, it HEAVILY leans masculine. TO MY NOSE, its all about two main notes, Oud and pure grey benzoin resin. Im talking about the solid grey mentholy Loban that comes in big chunks. Its popular where I live and quite pricey. Its usually used as incense. Ive been searching for this scent profile for ages, and this one nails it. It captures so realistically the experience of this particular benzoin burning on charcoal. <br />
<br />
But as much as I loved it and was thrilled to finally find what Id been looking for, it gave me the worst skull splitting headaches imaginable. So with a heavy heart I decided to gift it to my 17 yo nephew. Its now his signature scent, he loves it so much and hes always saying it gets him a huuuge amount of compliments from friends, teachers and complete strangers.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2296643"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2296643#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2290733" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2290733" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Eau de kev53"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1162053"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1162053.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Eau de kev53" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-L-Homme-39029.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39029.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada L'Homme"title="Prada L'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2290733ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2290733" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1162053">Eau de kev53</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-21">09/21/24 14:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Some of these negative comments from people simply amazes me. This is a gorgeous fragrance by far. I read where people are almost writing a book on how they despise the fragrance. Well hey buddy if its so bad why do you spend a third of your life writing how much you hate it? For me if I dislike a fragrance I would not go on and on and on making stories up just to get laughs and attention. Maybe you cant afford it? Or.. maybe you work with a competitor? Any who, this fragrance rocks and Ive been in the fragrance game for over 35 years. Maybe you apply it over your dry non exfoliant skin? Not everyone knows how to apply a fragrance the correct way. I always get compliments on this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2290733"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2290733#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2288647" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
