padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1896272">H4jdm</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-19">09/19/24 17:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is so good man. The saffron in this is so dominant, throughout the whole time. Its spicy and has that oud to it. Longevity is pretty good, its been 10 hours and its still going nicely. The sample I have is from 2022. But Im not sure if the new batches, are the same. Its quite pricey, but probably wont pick it up. On discounts, it is tempting. <br />
<br />
Recommended </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2288647"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2288647#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282983" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2282983" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Felixthreeone"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1753657"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1753657.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Felixthreeone" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Uden-Overdose-52433.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52433.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Uden Overdose"title="Uden Overdose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2282983ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2282983" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1753657">Felixthreeone</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-14">09/14/24 15:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Thank you, @Zongo for one of, if not THE best fragrance reviews I've had the pleasure of reading on this site. Not only did I snarf my coffee out of my nose laughing, I also cried a little at how accurately you described this 'fragrance'. It is, exactly as you described. My hat is off to you, sir. Bravo!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2282983"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2282983#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282977" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2282977" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zongo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1559457"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1559457.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zongo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2282977ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2282977" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1559457">Zongo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-14">09/14/24 15:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hey, you slack-jawed, mall-crawling fragrance junkies! Ever wondered what it smells like when a nuclear reactor has a meltdown in a spice bazaar? Well, strap on your hazmat suits and prepare for olfactory annihilation with Initio's Oud for Greatness, a scent that'll make you wish you were born without nostrils.<br />
<br />
This isn't just a fragrance, oh no. This is chemical warfare in a bottle, a scent so powerful it could strip paint off a battleship and make a skunk beg for mercy. It comes at you like a rabid rhino on a rampage through an Indian spice market, all hopped up on bath salts and ready to trample your senses into oblivion.<br />
<br />
The opening salvo of saffron and nutmeg hits you like a frying pan to the face, leaving you dazed, confused, and questioning your life choices. But don't think for a second that's the worst of it, you masochistic musk-huffers. Oh no, the real olfactory waterboarding is just beginning.<br />
<br />
As this beast develops, it morphs into something so aggressively spicy, you'll swear you've been waterboarded with a vat of pumpkin spice latte dregs from Satan's own Starbucks. It's the kind of scent that makes you wonder if the perfumer wasn't some mad scientist bent on world domination through nasal assault.<br />
<br />
And the oud? Ha! Don't make me laugh. If there's any real oud in this juice, I'll eat my typewriter. This is about as close to genuine oud as a gas station air freshener is to a field of wildflowers. It's a synthetic nightmare, a Frankenstein's monster of aromachemicals stitched together in some underground lab.<br />
<br />
The longevity? It'll outlast the cockroaches in a nuclear winter. The sillage? It leaves a trail so potent, you'll be violating air quality regulations in three states. It's the kind of scent that doesn't just announce your presence - it files a restraining order against good taste on your behalf.<br />
<br />
Is it for everyone? Only if "everyone" includes masochists, olfactory terrorists, and people who've lost all sense of smell and decency. This isn't a fragrance, it's a war crime in a bottle, a Geneva Convention violation you can spray on your pulse points.<br />
<br />
So go ahead, if you dare. Douse yourself in this noxious elixir and prepare for an aromatic journey straight to the ninth circle of spice hell. Because in this world of timid, watered-down designer swill, Oud for Greatness stands tall as a towering monument to excess, a middle finger raised high to the very concept of subtlety.<br />
<br />
Oud for Greatness isn't just a fragrance, it's a cautionary tale, a reminder that sometimes, the road to olfactory hell is paved with good intentions and way too much synthetic oud. And in this cruel circus of life, it's the aromatic equivalent of a clown car crashing into a fireworks factory - loud, overwhelming, and ultimately, a bit sad.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2282977"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2282977#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282662" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2282662" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FiveFootBeast"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1691411"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1691411.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FiveFootBeast" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2282662ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2282662" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1691411">FiveFootBeast</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-14">09/14/24 10:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Never smelled this but @Cletus Lorentz comment on has me dead 08/29/24 11:08<br />
He said <br />
<br />
"What would all these perfumers without talent do,if the world was not filled with all these people without taste?"</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2282662"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2282662#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282458" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2282458" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Robusto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1199448"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Robusto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Reflection-45-Man-69488.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69488.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Reflection 45 Man"title="Reflection 45 Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2282458ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2282458" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1199448">Robusto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-14">09/14/24 07:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ive had a bottle of this for years but barely wear it.which is a shame because it a gorgeous scent. I have a problem with spraying fragrances on the back of my hand and shoving my nose into it for the entire day instead of letting the fragrance come to me.<br />
<br />
Up close and personal with OFG is a stank fest and a complete turnoff. In the air this stuff magical and doesnt smell like it does up close on you skin. I wore this last night when my wife and I went out with some friends.outdoor setting. Three complements from people I didnt know. I caught wafts of it all night and even this morning!<br />
<br />
The stuff is sophistication to the 10th degree! It really does demand attention and can be a conversation starter in the right environment.<br />
<br />
Cold weather appropriate but can be warm on a cool summer night. Definitely try before you buy. Its not everyones cup of tea so know what youre getting into before spending hundreds on a bottle. <br />
<br />
Cheers!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2282458"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2282458#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282061" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I've been in love with it since it came out. I've decant of Neo, Haltane, Outcast Blue but none of them were as perfect as OFG. Best Oud &amp; Saffron combination. Oud is slightly medical but still quality, drydown is you can die for. The performance is amazing. 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2280111"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2280111#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2275453" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1557567">PaddyOhFraiche</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-07">09/07/24 22:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my first full bottle of Initio and I dont regret it at all. This is such a beautiful scent. I cant wait to wear it when it gets cooler. Initially I was gonna get side effect but I have about 20ml left in a decant and I rarely wear it because its super sweet and heavy. This is much more wearable as it adds in some dirty earthy rawness with the oud &amp; patchouli base. The bottle is also beautiful. I got the 90ml on fragrancelord for around $160 with a discount. Its a tester but it comes with a cap! Solid deal!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2275453"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2275453#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2275057" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Accompanied by lavender and woody note<br />
Reminding me of Haltane, but it's more of a powerhouse</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2275057"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2275057#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2274018" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2274018" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="arthi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1267993"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1267993.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="arthi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rook-Perfumes/Suede-50271.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50271.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Suede"title="Suede"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2274018ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2274018" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1267993">arthi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-06">09/06/24 16:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A woody powerhouse that lasts forever. Unisex, but not remotely subtle or neutral. Lasts forever on clothes. <br />
<br />
Unlike the clones, the real one eventually trails off into a faintly bitter and resinous smoky sweetness I just love  like burned-down ritual incense. A natural for fall and winter, but I wore a little of it walking around all day in 90F heat and after I sweated off all the metallic spice it smelled like wood, incense and gunpowder. Fantastic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2274018"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2274018#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2271843" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1453442">Cletus Lorentz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 11:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What would all these perfumers without talent do,if the world was not filled with all these people without taste?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2264889"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2264889#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256531" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2256531" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mecroux"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2066975"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2066975.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mecroux" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2256531ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2256531" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2066975">mecroux</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-21">08/21/24 14:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm on vacation, this being my final night in Lisbon; and I decided a little shopping was in order.  I walked past OTRO Perfume Concept on Avenida da Liberdade, and it looked so cool I had to stop in.<br />
<br />
The sales ladies were excellent - after discussing my likes, I was presented a handful of different options, and Oud for Greatness was the second. My jaw dropped and I just looked at her in awe.  We tried a few more (Bahar from Spirit of Dubai also impressed, just not in the same way), and I kept coming back to the hand on which she'd sprayed OFG.  <br />
<br />
It was familiar and I finally pinned it on some kind of similarity to Byredo Rouge Chaotique, which is probably my favorite fragrance to-date.  But, they're not the same at all.  It's like RC grew up and ironed out the chaos.  That energy is now just power.  OFG is far more suited for frequent wear (both in its subtler presence &amp; price per mL), and I jumped for it.  Fall is coming, and I cannot wait to wear it on repeat!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2256531"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2256531#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254630" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2254630" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FreshNBussin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1860772"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1860772.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FreshNBussin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/H24-65147.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65147.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="H24"title="H24"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2254630ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2254630" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1860772">FreshNBussin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-19">08/19/24 17:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow. Just wow. Right from the first sniff of the cap, I instantly thought ''quality''. Smelled a few Oud fragrances here and there from big houses but not really into it... but with that said... I get it. Hard for me to describe the scent but the one word that comes to mind right away is smooth. Just got a decant and I finally get the hype, it is well deserved. Definitely legendary tier in the Oud game. The future dream collection just got another bottle. Also, the performance is POTENT, spray with care.<br />
<br />
-Update. This thing is nuclear. One spray and I'm smelling it for HOURS. I can only imagine if I give it the classic 5-6 pops around the neck and arms. Looking forward to the winter hehehe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2254630"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2254630#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2253071" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2243272" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rude_Oud_Dude"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2216664"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rude_Oud_Dude" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2243272ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2243272" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2216664">Rude_Oud_Dude</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-08">08/08/24 19:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First oud fragrance I ever smelled, and it's still magical for a polite oud fragrance. This is an amazing masculine dark cool weather or evening scent. Western (non-fecal) oud, saffron, sweetness are noticeable at first, and it persists with those notes for a long time. Performance is great. Not as balanced as TF Oud Wood, which leans a little lighter and more floral/powdery, but what it does, it's extremely good at.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2243272"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2243272#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2241967" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2241967" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BandmanMrBandman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081102"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2081102.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BandmanMrBandman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/K-by-Dolce-Gabbana-56358.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56358.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="K by Dolce & Gabbana"title="K by Dolce & Gabbana"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2241967ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2241967" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081102">BandmanMrBandman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-07">08/07/24 13:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is pretty good in terms of an inoffensive clean oud. It has like a sweet and spicy feel from the nutmeg and saffron thats vaguely like the one in BR540 with a touch of lavender that gives it a purple smell to me if that makes sense almost grape. A couple hours later all that remains is the oud cant really see anyone hating it, clean woody inoffensive. The longevity is insane easily lasting 15 hours and over a week on paper with a soft projection to skin scent. <br />
<br />
I think that Oud for Greatness is better than something like Oud Wood its masculine, long lasting, and hard to hate imo. Very expensive, but still is better than others around this price point (Oud Wood) and if its still too expensive at discount you can get Oud for Glory for a fraction of the price as Oud for Greatness</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2241967"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2241967#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239858" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2239858" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tooturntswizz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1473903"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1473903.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tooturntswizz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2239858ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2239858" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1473903">Tooturntswizz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-05">08/05/24 14:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Right from the start, you can tell the raw materials in this fragrance are of exceptional quality. It's sweet, thick, and gourmand. The opening notes of saffron and nutmeg, blended into a sweet, thick treacle. As it develops, you experience smooth, dry oud, all wrapped together with an enveloping musk that further enhances its smoothness.<br />
<br />
This is a 5-star fragrance. I'm genuinely surprised by the outstanding quality and the incredible scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2239858"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2239858#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2237874" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Id compare it to a sweeter Oud Satin Mood by MFK, without the roses. They definitely smell similar and would layer great together.<br />
This fragrance smells luxurious and can be worn by man or woman.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2237874"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2237874#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2233869" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is just so masculine, sexy, heavy and magnetic. Stictly evening wear. Date night staple. Simply dazzling! The oud and spices are blended to perfection. Oudy, spicy, leathery. I really like that it's not too sweet like so many cold weather scents. I wear this with a leather jacket or with a classy coat, works magic with both. Projects and stays for a long time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2233869"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2233869#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2231189" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Please do not listen to anyone that says this smells like Sauvage Elixir.  That would be an insult. If you are a man, and you are on this page looking for a reason to try this out, stop reading and just try it out. You won't regret it.  I went through my first bottle in a few months and gladly going into my life savings to buy another lol. 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2230599"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2230599#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2230394" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's easy to wear. I was expecting something completely different. Sweeter than I expected. very strong performer no problems with that. Good quality nice bottle</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2224855"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2224855#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2224452" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2224452" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="egnomac"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2080216"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="egnomac" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kenneth-Cole/Mankind-Rise-94718.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.94718.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mankind Rise"title="Mankind Rise"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2224452ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2224452" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2080216">egnomac</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-20">07/20/24 11:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great Oud scent. This doesnt last as long on my skin as what some other people say, but it still lasts a solid 6 hours on me, which is good enough for most occasions. The use of Oud is interesting in this one, it doesnt entirely feel like normal Oud, but nonetheless it is great and well blended. You can smell the Oud the entirety of the fragrance with a musky sweet dry down.<br />
<br />
8.4/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2224452"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2224452#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2222795" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is a game changer</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2222795"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2222795#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2220621" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1814890">It&#039;s Liz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-16">07/16/24 17:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dont know what people mean by this being overtly masculine. It wears beautifully on me and it does not feel like I had to use my bfs deodorant after a long night, so to say. <br />
<br />
It melds with my skin in such a relaxing and enticing way, I kept lifting my wrist to my nose all day to take in more of this fragrances complexities and nuances. A truly exceptional representation of oud. Absolutely fantastic. My partner absolutely loves it as well- he loves it on himself and he loves it on me, too. It is unfortunate that it is so damned expensive, though. I have a decant that I am treasuring for the moment. Hopefully Ill find a discounted bottle from a trusted e-commerce site in the future! I did just order oud for glory on a blind buy in the hopes that it has a similar impact, but I rarely am convinced by even the most accurate of dupes. But then again, it was only $25 for the bottle, so it is worth a try!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2220621"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2220621#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2220485" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This DNA is a must try, for anyone over 25, not at all for younger guys. I don`t like it, but i respect that this fragrance caused 15 different clones, who do the same thing this does, for a fraction of the price. So, i don`t recommend it, get the Lattafa interpretation of this one, may perform a little worse but it is like 5-6 times cheaper. <br />
<br />
Smell: 5/10<br />
Performance: 9/10<br />
Price: 2/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2220485"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2220485#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215642" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2158041">Literally 1984</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-10">07/10/24 08:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Saffron and light lavender upfront, followed by some lightly smokey oud that isn't at all funky to me and some creamy musk that isn't unpleasantly soapy. Very nice fragrance but it honestly didn't blow me away. 8.5/10.<br />
<br />
As for what the person said below me I don't really get, haltane is definitely a great scent and to me it's stronger too. I can actually see the similarity now that someone mentioned it. I'd say that's the sweet smokey oudness of both of them.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2214071"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2214071#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2212677" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; But this... I think it might the saffron, lavender and patchouli being so prominent in this that makes it smell so good. It smells fresh and clean and classy. <br />
<br />
Performance is amazing, projects like a beast and doesn't wash off my clothes.<br />
<br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2198112"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2198112#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2195434" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2195434" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Karine_Quebec"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1404067"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Karine_Quebec" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2195434ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2195434" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1404067">Karine_Quebec</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-21">06/21/24 14:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>J'ai combin quelques minuscule gouttes de "Oud for greatness" (provenant d'un chantillon 2ml) avec le parfum "Molcule 01"(4 push,  la nuque, dcollet, bras). La combinaison a t une superbe surprise, le premier donne une explosion d'odeur et le second cr une finale tout en douceur.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2195434"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2195434#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2194700" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2194700" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vrios97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1656456"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1656456.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vrios97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2194700ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2194700" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1656456">Vrios97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-20">06/20/24 19:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am a woman and because of my love for the more bold and woodsy scents, my husband surprised me with this perfume a couple Christmases ago.  This is unisex, and I can see why a lot of people find it to be masculine but my husband and I feel its perfect and sexy as hell for me, a woman!  Its spicy-warm woodsy wrapped in a cloud of powdery and sweet goodness!  I find it to be a little gourmand in the best way.  After its dried down, my husband tells me I smell like caramel. While I dont smell caramel per se, I know exactly what he means. The dry down smells like ingredients not even listed or its probably the nutmeg and/or saffron giving it that dark sweetness that mixed with the patchouli makes it feel edible. I love it. Im obsessed with it. I now have other women loving it and buying it for themselves.  Its beast mode strong and lasts forever. The sillage is amazingIve had people in stores following my trail to ask what Im wearing.  The only other perfume Ive experienced this with was another unisex one, Jo Malones Myrrh &amp; Tonka.  I only use it during fall and winter because its one of those spicier and smoky scents perfect for colder days/nights. Makes me want to go to the mountains and roast some marshmallows.  Highly recommend it. <br />
<br />
And no, it does not smell like Baccarat Rouge 540 mixed with others.  If anything, to me it mostly resembles a darker, woodier version of Replicas By the Fireplace w/ patchouli IMO</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2194700"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2194700#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2194421" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2194421" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mattynice74"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2057464"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mattynice74" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Absolu-Aventus-84112.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84112.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Absolu Aventus"title="Absolu Aventus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2194421ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2194421" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2057464">Mattynice74</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-20">06/20/24 13:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Went very animalic on me. I smelled like a musty, uncleaned barnyard floor. It was screetchy, a bit metallic, floral and fecal. What a combination, huh? <br />
<br />
It smelled like a horse ate a big bowl of copper penny and lavender salad, then shat on me. <br />
<br />
It lasts forever too, a full shower couldn't get it off me. I still had whiffs hours later. Unfortunately, this meant the headache and queasy feeling was also long lasting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2194421"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2194421#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2194300" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1162053">Eau de kev53</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-04">06/04/24 14:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>@ke3ke3 @Smokeyflora yes the sign of the great seal on the bottle of Oud for Greatness all goes hand in hand of the money smell. Notice on the back of the dollar bill you see the Anuit Coeptis seal which reveals the eye same as on the bottle. This was all planned out well! Great analogy @Smokeyflora</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2178026"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2178026#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2177078" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2177078" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ke3ke3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2101926"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2101926.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ke3ke3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Crivelli/Iris-Malikhan-62617.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62617.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Iris Malikhn"title="Iris Malikhn"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2177078ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2177078" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2101926">ke3ke3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-03">06/03/24 17:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have to say to the gentleman who said that this smells like a stack of fresh USD. You are totally, completely on point.. this is a photorealistic stack of United States dollars! Im actually shocked by that. If youve ever wanted to literally smell like money here you go!! I mean this in the best way possible, OFG smells incredible.<br />
<br />
This was love at first sniff for me. I see it labeled as unisex but to me this is incredibly masculine. Regardless, this may be one of the finest fragrances to ever waft into my nostrils wow, truly stunning. This fragrance is an absolute masterpiece!!<br />
<br />
Currently I just own a small sample, but I have every intent of purchasing a full bottle. Ive been testing a lot of masculine leaning fragrances lately and of all that Ive sampled (primarily PDM, which is usually my favorite house), OFG takes the cake. This is an absolutely stunning fragrance, and despite this feeling truly masculine to me, I may rock it anyways (I dont have a man to put it on, so hey, why not!?). <br />
<br />
This fragrance would be magical during the fall, though I think it would also be lovely in the winter! Maybe as an evening fragrance in the spring,  but wear what you like! As a woman, I think its best for me around the holidays. I would think this to be a pretty safe blind buy for men but, Im not a man. For women, definitely sample it, but if you generally love masculine fragrances or that type of candle, youll be pleased with this!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2177078"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2177078#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2174015" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2174015" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="monsieur.moustache"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1729574"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1729574.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="monsieur.moustache" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2174015ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2174015" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1729574">monsieur.moustache</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-31">05/31/24 18:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The lovechild of BR540 and TF's Oud Wood. Smells like robotic royalty.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2174015"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2174015#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2170223" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2170223" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ivanthegreat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2094715"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ivanthegreat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2170223ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2170223" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2094715">ivanthegreat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-28">05/28/24 08:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>OFG is a dark, slightly earthy scent that has a sexy sweetness to it that I think is not talked about enough. The saffron-sweetness is similar to that of BR540, but overall these 2 fragrances are nowhere near similar, as the sweetness of OFG sits atop a very earthy base that BR540 doesnt have. Also, BR540 is unisex/feminine while OFG is pretty far on the masculine side. I dont think the comparisons are accurate.<br />
<br />
I got this on discount for 270 USD and the price definitely reflects the quality of the perfumery and performance. However, Im slightly questioning my purchase because the intensity and richness of this scent may be better suited for someone older than me. Also, Its not versatile enough for my lifestyle. I wouldnt wear this to school or anything professional because it could be too strong for those occasions, and I cant wear it in the spring, summer because it simply isnt fresh enough. Basically, I can only wear it during select occasions in the coldest months which sucks. I havent given it a full wearing outside of the house yet because I just bought it this summer but I will update this review once I have in a couple of months.<br />
<br />
Update: I was wearing this and my mom smelled it in the air and thought it was BR540 extrait. I still dont think its anywhere close to being a BR540 inspired fragrance but take what you want from that interaction. Also, I only had on a tiny spray on my wrist and she smelled it in passing so performance is def beastly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2170223"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2170223#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2165283" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2165283" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SmokeyFlora"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1415541"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1415541.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SmokeyFlora" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.474.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Green Irish Tweed"title="Green Irish Tweed"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2165283ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2165283" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1415541">SmokeyFlora</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-23">05/23/24 08:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Simply put, it smells like USD. Take a stack of fresh dollar bills and fan yourself...you'll be on the right track!<br />
<br />
It is a very unique, one of a kind smell. I often ask for a test strip of it while I'm shopping for other fragrances because it's just...distinct. People that want others to notice them by their nose should buy it. It is a conversational piece for sure and as long as you don't overspray it won't offend anyone.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2165283"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2165283#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2165032" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
