I must agree it's rather a men's perfume, cannot imagine it on a woman</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2165032"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2165032#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2158231" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2158231" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="librabeing"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1376682"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="librabeing" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-EAUX-Primordiales/Iris-Palladium-90012.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90012.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Iris Palladium"title="Iris Palladium"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2158231ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2158231" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1376682">librabeing</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-16">05/16/24 13:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My holy grail oud scent. I've had it for a few years now. And I'm still fully in love. Everyone asks what I'm wearing when I wear this, more than with any other fragrance I own. If you love this, it will spoil nearly every other similar fragrance for you. :) Nothing comes close.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2158231"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2158231#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2156357" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2156357" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="player1363"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480218"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1480218.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="player1363" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2156357ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2156357" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480218">player1363</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-15">05/15/24 01:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is cloned to death at this point. I would not buy it in 2024. Many brands released something similar/cheaper than OFG. Just check the alternatives if you are a huge fan of the scent profile.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2156357"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2156357#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2155736" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2155736" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Myrtillajus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722368"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1722368.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Myrtillajus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2155736ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2155736" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722368">Myrtillajus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-14">05/14/24 10:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>"Everything you can imagine,<br />
nature has already created it."<br />
Oud for greatness is a fragrance that with its symbolism and olfactory pyramid celebrates the greatness of nature.<br />
Creamy and slightly sweet notes of saffron accompany a very high quality, woody and slightly balsamic, non-animalic Agarwood, which in the evolution has a clean and slightly pungent, non-invasive lavender coming through.<br />
A very successful combination, which has decreed the triumph of this fragrance, which is very pleasant and a real crowd pleaser.<br />
It is warm, enveloping, in my opinion ideal for the cooler seasons.<br />
"A Tree-lined Path in Autumn" by Brendekilde, celebrating the beauty of nature.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2155736"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2155736#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2154814" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I smell it on myself all throughout the day, damn I smell good!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2131638"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2131638#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2130832" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2130832" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Officiallyvile"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2103795"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Officiallyvile" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2130832ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2130832" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2103795">Officiallyvile</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-20">04/20/24 14:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A true beast. The longest lasting perfume in my collection. Dont blind buy because if you dont like the smell, you cannot get rid of it - the scent will haunt you and your clothes like a demon for days. Leans more masculine although i do use it sometimes as a woman. This is the only Oud i have since other ouds kinda intimidate me. This screams oppulent, rich CEO, zaddy daddy vibes (picture the likes of George Clooney and Brad pitt, or Cate Blanchette in a suit). Definitely not a girly girls perfume. Very sexy on older men/mature women (30 plus) who owns their own business. Safe for the workplace although 2- 4 sprays are enough. Any more and you basically become a smell bomb which can give people headaches. Its a beautiful smell of florals and oud although it does not suit my style. Layer it with more feminine sweet perfumes to soften the edges and you'll get yourself a very unique signature scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2130832"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2130832#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2125983" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Incredible longevity and sillage.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2125983"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2125983#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2124825" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1162053">Eau de kev53</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-14">04/14/24 16:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Who I said who said you cant rock this in the heat? I wore this yesterday because I was in the mood to rock this when I got ready for the day. 75 to 80 degrees here in the Carolinas, now I will say 3 sprays max. I did one on the neck(rear) and two on the front of my shirt chest area and it was on!! Compliments galore for 9 plus hours. Oud fragrances can be worn whenever just in warmer climates dont kill the juice and youll be okay. Thanks for reading now enjoy this juice because I am</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2124825"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2124825#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2122037" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2122037" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="shgreenejr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1952588"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1952588.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="shgreenejr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2122037ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2122037" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1952588">shgreenejr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-11">04/11/24 22:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This low-key might be one of the best scents of all time.  11/10.  Literally every. single. time I wear this, someone gives me a compliment.  Every single time.  And I will be the first to say this, but the dry down after about 9-10 hours (yes it lasts that long) smells like an Oud-y Sauvage.  If you are a man, of any age, I strongly urge you to buy this.  The oud is blended to perfection.  Better than Oud Wood.  Oud Wood is for special occasions (it also lasts like 45 mins).  You can wear Oud for Greatness at any time of the day.  The initial scent is a 10/10.  4 hours later the scent is a 10/10 and literally 11 hours later the scent transforms into a clean oud-y fresh scent that projects when you move your body around, it's the weirdest thing.  This might be one of the only fragrances that's worth the price tag.<br />
<br />
Easy cheat code: if you are a man and you need to go to an event or outing around a lot of people, try spraying Oud for Greatness on your neck and arms, Ombre Leather parfum on your shirt, and Paragon on your pants.  LOL. Unstoppable.  Everyone's olfactory senses around you will go berserk. <br />
<br />
And yes, I do smell a tiiiny bit of 540 in the drydown, but its blended so well that its like its own thing.<br />
<br />
Master. Piece.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2122037"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2122037#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2121919" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2119855" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tigerlilley9"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2027611"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2027611.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tigerlilley9" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2119855ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2119855" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2027611">Tigerlilley9</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-09">04/09/24 20:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For some reason this is what I was expecting from Tom Ford Black Orchid! Sexy, mysterious, unisex and witchy. That was my first thought the instant I smelled it. I also thought, I appreciate it, but Im not sure this is what I want to smell like every day. How often would I have occasion to wear this?<br />
<br />
The dry down is addictive. Its intoxicating. Im still experimenting with samples, so Im not running out to buy a full bottle just yet. However, this one is a contender.<br />
<br />
I was surprised that most members of my family like it too. Only one person said, Thats a lot of smell. Which, shes right. It is a lot of smell. The longer I have it on the more I love it, and it is not showing any sign of slowing down!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2119855"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2119855#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2119696" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2118026" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kai.laidla"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/170074"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.170074.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kai.laidla" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Step-Aboard/Milano-Centrale-57002.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57002.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Milano Centrale"title="Milano Centrale"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2118026ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2118026" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/170074">kai.laidla</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-08">04/08/24 06:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A copycat of MFK BR540. But more masculine. For my taste a bit too overpowering synthetical smell. I live in colder climate, so maybe this scent would be a bit more complex and interesting somewhere where its much warmer? Have tried it several times to understand why it is so popular, but must admit that every time have been disappointed that I tried it on my skin. Would see this one more as a scent for an ambience (but in very small doses) in some hotel lobby or in some speakeasy toilet rooms, but dont see it matching with a real humans skin chemistry. Too synthetic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2118026"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2118026#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2118009" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2118009" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Olenchyk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2043694"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2043694.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Olenchyk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2118009ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2118009" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); But my god, this is a bomb! reeeeeally sexy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2118009"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2118009#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2116049" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Bet more people love it than hate it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2116049"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2116049#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2114158" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I was so curious that had to try, so I got a 10ml, which, in fact, should last a life time. <br />
For me it is far too masculine, too strong. <br />
I can detect a vintage vibe from a long ago era when some of the ingredients werent so restricted. <br />
It is nice but not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2114158"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2114158#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2113420" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is very strong. I'm not a fan of BR so this is a no for me, but def sample because it is a bit more masculine altho still sweet. Its just that strong saffron not I cant get with!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2113420"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2113420#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2111763" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2111763" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Esna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/130358"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.130358.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Esna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Headspace/Kirsch-Headspace-86159.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.86159.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kirsch Headspace"title="Kirsch Headspace"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2111763ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2111763" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/130358">Esna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-02">04/02/24 08:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This became my BFs most favorite scent as soon as he sampled it, and he purchased a full bottle asap because I fell hardcore for it on him as well; I dont even want him to alternate his other scents now. This reminds me of my favorite song is EL MESAS (The Messiah) from Ricardo Arjona: the man described on that song is mysterious, upper echelon, dark, upper echelon, godly and strangely apocalyptic sexy. Itss addictive, incredible sillage and lasts forever. I dont get any BR540 vibes at all and Ive owned all the versions of BR for years, so I have no clue why people keep comparing it! The only similarity is that this is at the same height of niche grandeur and status that BR has, and its well deserved but this is better because its not a borderline crowd pleaser like BR is; I love that. Even if its hyped IIts not for everyone, almost to the point of telling someone that their demeanor isnt compatible with that perfume now have some respect and take it off!  ridiculous, yes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2111763"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2111763#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2111410" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2111410" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Anabol2336"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1007028"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1007028.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Anabol2336" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Sedley-56273.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56273.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sedley"title="Sedley"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2111410ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2111410" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1007028">Anabol2336</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-01">04/01/24 22:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bought a decant back in 2021 and finally ran out so I went ahead and got a full bottle. Gorgeous very wearable oud fragrance. Basically smells like a very nice, very clean, very handsome man. Its a lovely scent, but maybe not for extremely young guys because it smells very classic and vintage to me, a bit of an 80s early 90s vibe that I love personally, but it isn't for everyone. As far as performance goes this one is even stronger than Dior Sauvage Elixir. One spray will last until you wash your shirt.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2111410"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2111410#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2109972" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2109972" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Janscent"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1421331"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Janscent" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2109972ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2109972" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1421331">Janscent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-31">03/31/24 12:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pretty linear. I really like how the ingredients play together and i can identify them all i think. Love the opening of saffron and i smell patchouli too. Dries down to a nice oud skin scent, but others still notice it so i guess i get noseblind, which is sad because its really good. I dont get the beastly longevity poeple talk about, maybe it is the reformulation. Still really good at 80% alc. 9.5/10 from me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2109972"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2109972#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2105342" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2105342" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lnu1986"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073558"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2073558.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lnu1986" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2105342ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2105342" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073558">lnu1986</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-26">03/26/24 20:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sometimes the saffron note can be just a tad off putting for some but once you wear this fragrance and let it sit it quickly evolves into the most sophisticated OUD fragrance. Its beautifully made. Its so good that it can definitely be worn either by male or female. Its a powerhouse of a fragrance. The price is a little more than some but its so worth it. 9/10 for sure</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2105342"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2105342#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2104663" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2104663" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Msala140"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1787860"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1787860.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Msala140" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Addict-Eau-de-Parfum-2014-28201.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28201.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Addict Eau de Parfum (2014)"title="Dior Addict Eau de Parfum (2014)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2104663ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2104663" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1787860">Msala140</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-26">03/26/24 07:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh this is S E X Y. On my skin i get something boozy and  a mild leather probably but how well blended this all is. On the opening I got a light spice from the saffron, I didnt really detect the lavender much unfortunately. The dry down is so sexy, with the patchouli and oud very prominent on my skin with the leather and booze vibe going on. <br />
<br />
It projects big time . I cant speak on longevity, I wore this during my workout so can only say that it still stuck around after all my sweating and then doing chores at home w the AC off (its 77+ degrees here in FL) . So I will have to try it out more. <br />
<br />
This is Unisex , maybe some can say slightly masculine but I think for me as a female its straight in the middle and I would totally wear this on cooler days , because year round I can see this suffocating me, but on cooler nights its perfect. I would love to have my husband wear this too. <br />
<br />
Scent : 10/10<br />
Projection : 10/10<br />
Longevity : requires more testing<br />
<br />
Update : lasts 10+ hrs</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2104663"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2104663#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2103046" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I've tried to wear this many times, but I just can't passed the saffron note.<br />
<br />
I don't know why but prominent saffron notes make me feel nauseous. This isn't quite as bad as BR540 for making me feel ill, but I still find it unpleasant to wear and always have to wash it off or over spray something else within an hour. No denying it's a quality fragrance, but it's just not something I enjoy in the slightest.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2079690"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2079690#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2074035" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2074035" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PULPUL75"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1932919"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1932919.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PULPUL75" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Amber-Heath-45422.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45422.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amber Heath"title="Amber Heath"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2074035ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2074035" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1932919">PULPUL75</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-25">02/25/24 17:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hello reviewers <br />
Please if anyone has FALKAR from Bvlgari &amp; OFG from INITIO, let know if there is any similarities, because I have one of them and I strongly want to have the other one.<br />
So please I kindly ask you, it is worth to have both.<br />
Thanx my best regards </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2074035"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2074035#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2068370" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2068370" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SeductionScents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1581935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SeductionScents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Erba-Pura-55157.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55157.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Erba Pura"title="Erba Pura"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2068370ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2068370" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1581935">SeductionScents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-20">02/20/24 11:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a mix of BR540 and Dior Sauvage Elixir.  It  is strong , airy , sexy, bold and masculine.<br />
it says unisex  but cant see a feminine woman wearing this IMHO</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2068370"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2068370#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2067292" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1949338">MrMrBrian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-18">02/18/24 17:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Went thru tha wanna bes &amp; But now this has a clone out there that everyone seems to say is perfectly identical for $40 &amp; theyre making a profit on it lol..&amp; now this can found way almost half of that $400 price tag?? Hmmph I tried it, But never really was interested enough to begin with.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2066543"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2066543#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2064668" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2064668" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ginandrice"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246357"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1246357.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ginandrice" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Aesop/Hwyl-46895.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46895.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hwyl"title="Hwyl"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2064668ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2064668" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246357">ginandrice</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-16">02/16/24 18:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet, tangy oudwarm and textural, like fuzzy velvet. There's a subtle fruity blush to it like not-quite-ripe strawberries, and a slightly metallic element that makes me think of hammered copper.  <br />
<br />
It's a warm, expansive scent, but diffuse, gauzy; as though the scent molecules don't want to be close to each other and are all softly fizzing apart. Like woody spun sugar near a heat-source, just starting to crystalize at the edges. <br />
<br />
I suspect I'm partially anosmic to this (just as I'm <i>mostly</i> anosmic to its cousin scent, BR540). I can smell it enough to get a clear sense of it; it's unquestionably <i>present</i>; but the more I <i>try</i> to smell it, the less I actually canlike scooping at dust motes suspended in a shaft of light.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2064668"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2064668#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2063988" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2063988" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="YMJA"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1976733"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1976733.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="YMJA" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2063988ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2063988" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1976733">YMJA</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-16">02/16/24 05:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm sorry. How could you not love this? Sweet oud lifted by earthy patchouli and woods. Strong and long lasting. I'm going to get this soon. 10/10 from Initio</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2063988"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2063988#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2060366" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2060366" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheDogfatherHTX"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824841"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1824841.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheDogfatherHTX" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Pacific-Chill-81423.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81423.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pacific Chill"title="Pacific Chill"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2060366ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2060366" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824841">TheDogfatherHTX</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-12">02/12/24 16:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the most hyped offerings from Initio Parfums. I grabbed a sample of this from a certain subscription service () when they were offering it, as I wasn't prepared to drop $400 on a bottle to test it. Here's how it went;<br />
<br />
Scent:<br />
Opening is spicy, woody, and aromatic. The primary notes I get are saffron, oud, nutmeg, and lavender. The strongest of the notes are the oud and saffron. The oud is very woody; not overly animalic but still has that characteristic oud "funk" to it. The saffron is expectedly soft, earthy, and bittersweet. Following is the nutmeg for a spicy kick and lavender rounding it out with a soft and floral aromatic touch. The opening reminds me of several other oud/saffron fragrances I've sampled before, but done in a much higher quality. The dry down is woody, aromatic, and earthy. The primary notes I get are saffron, oud, lavender, and patchouli. The strongest of the notes are still the saffron and oud with the same accords as the opening, however the saffron has become stronger while the oud has dialed back. This gives the dry down a very soft earthiness with woody oud in the background. Following is the lavender for the same soft and floral nuance with patchouli in the background for added earthiness with a bit of sweetness. I can definitely understand the comparisons to BR540. I prefer the opening to the dry down, but both are very enjoyable. <br />
<br />
Performance:<br />
Initial projection is nuclear and fills a room. Sillage matches that intensity with an overwhelming scent trail. After a few hours the projection was under arms length and the scent trail was barely noticeable. This does not seem typical for this fragrance, as many say it's very powerful. I will say that I've had similar trouble with other fragrances I've purchased from this company, so I'm forced to assume this is something going on with the sample itself, and not the actual fragrance. <br />
<br />
When to wear:<br />
This is a fall/winter fragrance that leans more towards evening wear, but can be done in the daytime as well. I wouldn't pick this as an office fragrance, but it would work well on a date night.<br />
<br />
Blind buy:<br />
If you like woody saffron scents like BR540 this is a very safe blind buy. It's saffron and oud done to a very high quality.<br />
<br />
Final verdict:<br />
This is a tough call for me because I really don't feel like I'm getting the full experience. I think the scent itself is superbly done, and I would assume the performance would match that level of quality. Unfortunately, I can't say that for sure. I'm willing to bet if I had the actual bottle in hand my experience would be much different. If I get the chance to test from the actual bottle I'll try to revisit this review.<br />
<br />
Scent: 9/10<br />
Longevity: 4/10 ?<br />
Sillage: 4/10 ?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2060366"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2060366#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2059242" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2059242" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tjek"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1961654"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1961654.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tjek" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Imagination-67370.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67370.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Imagination"title="Imagination"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2059242ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2059242" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1961654">Tjek</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-11">02/11/24 13:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance reminds me of Gisada Ambassador Intense. I actually cant tell the difference, im smelling both right now</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2059242"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2059242#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2057889" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2050732" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stievenko"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/314167"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.314167.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stievenko" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2050732ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2050732" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);
