They have absolutely nothing to do with this scent. Like 0,0% similar. If you feel so, you really have to mature in the world of fragrance. Its an all time favorite, but the hype is not real as this scent is not for everybody (fortunately!!!). I love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2050732"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2050732#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2049834" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2049834" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thiagovidotto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1155530"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="thiagovidotto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2049834ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2049834" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1155530">thiagovidotto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-02">02/02/24 06:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am testing it right now and it puzzles me how people on this platform can really obsess with mid scents and absolutely destroy more creative ones. <br />
<br />
OFG smells good, obviously, but it is NOT amazing as how people paint it. <br />
<br />
You get a BR540 vibe + woods. Not oud exactly; more like an oud accord such as that in Oud and Bergamot by Jo Malone. <br />
<br />
It is ok and does not deserve a 4.30 score at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2049834"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2049834#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2049462" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2049462" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="unshkbl00"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/71250"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.71250.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="unshkbl00" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/A-Men-Pure-Malt-6103.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6103.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A*Men Pure Malt"title="A*Men Pure Malt"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2049462ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2049462" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/71250">unshkbl00</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-01">02/01/24 19:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This reminds if something but I cant quite name it. You definitely get the saffron and nutmeg mix upfront then the oud transition happens which adds some earthiness to the profile. Its smooth and balanced on my skin which is nice. Literally last all day on me and the good part is you may get whaffs of it every so often and you know its what others are also picking up. Not overpowering at all but strong enough to be noticed. Women may think you smell great but probably not verbally say anything, rather youll capture their attention if you spark a conversation. <br />
<br />
Not a blind buy type of scent. <br />
<br />
Overall: 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2049462"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2049462#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2048153" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2048153" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scentrist"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/8051"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.8051.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scentrist" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53641.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud for Greatness"title="Oud for Greatness"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2048153ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2048153" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/8051">Scentrist</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-31">01/31/24 14:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I guess it's been a while since I've posted any sort of review here, so a bit of back story. I'm now in Florida. Most heavy scents are off-limits for about 8 months of the year while South Florida becomes very tropical and humid, so meanwhile anything that becomes cloying normally turns into excruciating scent fatigue very quickly for us. I've tended toward lighter scents as a result since I wouldn't want a heavy Oud-based beast-mode fragrance in a New York City summer either. Then I happened upon this in the late summer months here and my opinions about Oud transformed. Granted the saffron and lavender help with tempering the heaviness of the Oud by a large margin, at least for me, but I found that this was tolerable and even pleasant to wear in all but the worst dog-days of Central Florida theme park heat (remember to exit through the gift shop, thank you). As I'm writing, it's 73 and breezy and this is perfect. I'm relieved I don't feel resigned to the grapefruit/orange/citrus fragrances that are otherwise fairly common game here. I dare say this is well-composed and not overbearing, pleasant to wear, and I don't smell like everyone else in a crowd. <br />
<br />
This has become a go-to for those days when I find that I would enjoy a warmer fragrance but don't want something that threatens to smother me or result in olfactive fatigue. Maybe not the most glowing review in words, but I'd say that I truly enjoy wearing this and preferred it over the other Initio scents that I sampled. These days it takes something substantive for me to add to my collection, so this was my splurge and I'm delighted with the decision.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2048153"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2048153#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2047246" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2047246" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jbozz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445544"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1445544.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jbozz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/MYSLF-Le-Parfum-94983.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.94983.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="MYSLF Le Parfum"title="MYSLF Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2047246ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2047246" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445544">jbozz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-30">01/30/24 18:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Holy smokes this is really good! I blind bought this from a discounter because I was already a huge fan of Parfums de Marleys Haltane, and honestly I couldnt be happier with Oud for Greatness. Its very much like the PDM except it just smells more upscale and refined to my nose, plus a bit denser. The oud in this is extremely wearable in my opinion but you should dress it up even if its just slacks and a nice long sleeve collared shirt. Really doesnt smell much like BR540 at all (or Sauvage Elixir), totally different kind of sweetness going on here and the woods just make this its own thing, but it has a similar vibe. Does anyone else get a leathery note by the way? Its not listed but I swear it has one. OFG is definitely geared for cool weather evenings and date nights, for me its like a nighttime counterpart to Haltane. Its simply a gorgeous scent and has me feeling like a millionaire. Doesnt seem too strong even with 4 sprays, but its giving me a really nice scent bubble which isnt in-your-face. Anybody can rock this one. I understand the hype now, definitely recommend checking this out if you want something sweet, sexy yet very classy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2047246"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2047246#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2039305" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2038048" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chowder.man"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958462"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1958462.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chowder.man" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2038048ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2038048" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958462">chowder.man</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-21">01/21/24 21:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i can definitely see people pulling this off, it's a nice woody/earthy scent, but there's a note in here that smells like dust to me. like, imagine, going into someone's dusty basement where they keep wood and dirt. that's what this smells like to me. it's definitely a unique scent, but it's just not for me.<br />
<br />
update: it's the patchouli and nutmeg that make it smell like that.<br />
<br />
5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2038048"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2038048#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2036322" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2036023" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gastro"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1739533"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1739533.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gastro" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Fiero-11802.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11802.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fiero"title="Fiero"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2036023ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2036023" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1739533">Gastro</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-19">01/19/24 16:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Is it me? I found this to be a lovely scent, great depth and very pleasing, BUT,  while it lasts on my skin for (so far)  9 hours, I don't find it nearly as beastly as most others that have reviewed it. <br />
I sprayed once on each wrist, twice on my neck, and once again on my chest area. If a scent is beastly, that should be enough to project loud and clear. This was not the case! I will try it one more time, and if I get the same results, I will not be getting this again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2036023"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2036023#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2035042" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Not unpleasant at all but I had 2 sprays of this and it was way too much! The following morning the died down scent is more where I would want it to be at the beginning, the scent of it then agains my skin was lovely and warm and unusual, but I am not sure when and where I would wear this again. One little spray only I think!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2030314"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2030314#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2026776" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Some women may think it's a little to masculine but it can also be layered with a more feminine scent. I love to wear it alone and layered. This is amazing !! If you love saffron  you will love this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2026776"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2026776#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2025135" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; went straight to this site to check for reviews of similar experience.  I think it is a gorgeous OUD fragrance. It has everything I look for in a scent. Quality is insane in regards to performance &amp; Sillage. However.. I Sprayed it on my skin and a couple minutes later it turned to an onion, celery food scent.  Yuck! It does NOT mix with my skin chemistry what so ever.  What a shame.  I am glad I didn't order a FB. OH but this will not stop me from enjoying it.  I'll just spray it strictly on clothing.  It is a beautiful scent &amp; I plan on basking in it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2024634"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2024634#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2023828" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2021466"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2021466#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2019513" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2019513" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CEMENT"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1782674"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1782674.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CEMENT" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Areej-Le-Dore/War-and-Peace-Part-II-63106.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.63106.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="War and Peace Part II"title="War and Peace Part II"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2019513ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2019513" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1782674">CEMENT</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-03">01/03/24 20:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I went into Oud for Greatness anticipating a flop and BOY WAS I WRONG.<br />
<br />
What is it like:<br />
A quick blast of synthetic oud <br />
Saffron giving allusion to BR540<br />
Lavender/Cinnamon giving Sauvage Elixir<br />
Generally a similar composition to PDM Haltane, but not as spineless.<br />
<br />
To me, it smells a lot like Sauvage Elixir on paper. I find Sauvage on skin a bit hollow while simultaneously aggressively cloying. It loses those top notes and ends up a sharp synthetic mess.<br />
<br />
While I can discern a hodgepodge of synthetics in Oud for Greatness, they've been cleverly blended and disguised. <br />
<br />
All in all, it's a spicy lavender bomb with some solid performance. The oud is a joke and a misnomer. The bottle is tacky imo but the juice is worth the squeeze. While it could be a case of exceeding low expectations, I'm happy to have given it a shot because I quite like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2019513"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2019513#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2019339" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2019339" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lidor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579960"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lidor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Scandal-Pour-Homme-Le-Parfum-74915.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74915.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Scandal Pour Homme Le Parfum"title="Scandal Pour Homme Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2019339ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2019339" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579960">lidor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-03">01/03/24 17:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells luxurious and very rich, a very special smell but ,because it has a crazy amount of clone, it is no longer so special.<br />
<br />
Scent:9<br />
Projection/Longevity:9<br />
Uniqueness:8<br />
quality:9.5<br />
Value for money: overpriced <br />
<br />
Overall:9</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2019339"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2019339#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2019081" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2019081" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="0xrafae"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1544521"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1544521.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="0xrafae" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2019081ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2019081" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1544521">0xrafae</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-03">01/03/24 12:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening reminds me of Amouage Epic, but that quickly gives way to a hefty mix of spices on a bed of oud wood, bringing to mind Baccarat Rouge. I get why some people like this, but it just doesn't click for me. The issue is, I can't picture any occasion where I'd feel like wearing this. That said, it's still a step up from Side Effect.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2019081"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2019081#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2018332" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2018332" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="yezidinationalist"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1955718"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="yezidinationalist" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2018332ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2018332" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1955718">yezidinationalist</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-02">01/02/24 19:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>fake oud, doesnt smell as bad as designers but still unimpressive, uninspired and poorly concocted</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2017374" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ohmy222"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1942444"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ohmy222" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2017374ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2017374" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1942444">ohmy222</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-01">01/01/24 19:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A beast of a fragrance. I was not the biggest fan but I am not as hot on straight Oud so it is not this fragrances fault. It is probably the most dominant example I have seen so it is adequately named. I gave my decant away and my friend love it. A true powerhouse in terms of projection and longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2017374"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2017374#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2015869" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2015869" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kellenf123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1860781"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="kellenf123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Gentle-Fluidity-Silver-53400.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53400.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gentle Fluidity Silver"title="Gentle Fluidity Silver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2015869ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2015869" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1860781">kellenf123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-31">12/31/23 01:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Upon first spray I smelled a nice rubbery, leathery oud with pungent spices and aromatic lavender. Within the dry down, the oud drops off and I was left with a dry spicy saffron-heavy scent with the wood + patchouli and lavender tying it together. I do kinda see the Sauvage Elixir connection people are pointing out. I don't find that this fragrance is "beast mode" but it is on the cusp. 3 sprays, pungent projection especially within the first few hours of spraying, 8-9 hours longevity on my skin, lasts forever on clothes though. While I think this is a masterpiece (and it lasts a little longer), I prefer Haltane due to it's softer, sweeter oud note with a more aromatic smell to it. Test before buying and don't use in hot weather or it will be cloying.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2015869"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2015869#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2011995" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2007890" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="&Alpha;&lambda;&epsilon;&xi;&nu;&delta;&rho;&alpha;"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/41025"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.41025.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="&Alpha;&lambda;&epsilon;&xi;&nu;&delta;&rho;&alpha;" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Guidance-78656.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78656.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guidance"title="Guidance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2007890ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2007890" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/41025">&Alpha;&lambda;&epsilon;&xi;&nu;&delta;&rho;&alpha;</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-22">12/22/23 08:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There was a deja vu upon the first spray. I expected a more pungent, right in your face opening, to be overwhelmed with fear and awe; instead, I was captivated by a familiar memory, rich amber with spices in the heart of a desert... And there, after spending a few minutes inhaling and indulging in the air of the desert, the eureka moment arrived : L Air du Desert Marocain!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2007890"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2007890#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2007844" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2007844" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Invasionbg"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1265999"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1265999.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Invasionbg" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-2020-58714.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58714.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme 2020"title="Dior Homme 2020"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2007844ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2007844" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1265999">Invasionbg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-22">12/22/23 07:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This<br />
Is<br />
Insane!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2007844"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2007844#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2007198" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2007198" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nonikocci"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1729420"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="nonikocci" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2007198ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2007198" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1729420">nonikocci</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-21">12/21/23 12:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you want to smell Oud for the first time and didn't have access to smell ADP's Oud, this is the next best thing tbh. It's so beautiful and well rounded, sillage is gorgeous. The saffron is not a main point , you do smell it in the top but when you have your musk as base , it just dries down to this beautiful light oud. The patchouli is doing such a great job providing support to the oud. I smell this together and it's just heavenly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2007198"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2007198#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2006052" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2006052" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="number68"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1544186"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1544186.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="number68" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Abdul-Samad-Al-Qurashi/Saudia-Blend-21279.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21279.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Saudia Blend"title="Saudia Blend"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2006052ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2006052" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1544186">number68</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-20">12/20/23 07:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Western friendly oud fragrance. I actually really like this one and will be wearing it often - it's very safe for everyday wear, daytime as well as evening fragrance. 2-3 sprays are more than enough.<br />
<br />
I also find that there's a spiritual element to this perfume, almost as if it connects you with something higher or deeper.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2006052"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2006052#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2004633" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2004633" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OwlFactory"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1872873"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1872873.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="OwlFactory" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Homme-Ideal-Eau-de-Parfum-37735.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.37735.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="LHomme Ideal Eau de Parfum"title="LHomme Ideal Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2004633ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2004633" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1872873">OwlFactory</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-18">12/18/23 15:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Like many of you I had heard rave reviews about Oud for Greatness. It sounded as if it could go on the Mount Rushmore of fragrances. But after finally getting my hands on it, I'm sad to say that I found it disappointing. <br />
<br />
Perhaps all the fanfare overhyped it, but I found it rather unappealing and don't have any desire to wear it. I would not classify this as a safe blind buy. I realize some people just don't like the presence of oud in a fragrance, but I am not one of those people. I very much enjoy oud, and am quite surprised that this didn't work for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2004633"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2004633#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2002524" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2002524" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ChiliOfTheValley"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1629944"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1629944.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ChiliOfTheValley" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Hacivat-Oud-80999.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.80999.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hacivat Oud"title="Hacivat Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2002524ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2002524" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1629944">ChiliOfTheValley</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-16">12/16/23 03:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oud for Greatness is one of the best oud fragrances suited for western noses. Deep, dark, rich and sweet in character, this is the type of fragrance that stays on your skin and clothes forever. And this is strong  definitely fills a room with just a few sprays.<br />
<br />
Wear this if you want to make a statement. But do keep in mind that this perfume is not for the faint of heart  you really have to like it to be able to pull it off. This is very mature and probably best suited for a masculine gentleman over 30 years old.<br />
<br />
The nutmeg, the lavender and the ambers in the base definitely remind me of Dior Sauvage Elixir and the performance is similar as well, but OFG leans a lot more middle-eastern in style. I own both fragrances, but OFG is a bit too much for me. Any time I wear it, I get nauseous after a couple of hours.<br />
<br />
Get a decant and test it multiple times before buying a full bottle, because youre either going to love it or hate it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2002524"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2002524#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2000910" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; So Im not the only one that got BR540 on oud from this one. Very surprising and likeable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2000910"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2000910#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2000720" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2000720" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Coolivana"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1921140"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1921140.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Coolivana" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2000720ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2000720" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1921140">Coolivana</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-13">12/13/23 21:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I sprayed it on my sleeves, the saffron note has dominated over everything.  And it is so spicy that it irritated my throat. To me the smell is kind off off-putting.  Luckily I decided to get this 5ml decant first instead of making a blind buy according the reviews.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="2000720"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=2000720#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1999695" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1999695" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OHLAWDTOMFAWD"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528157"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="OHLAWDTOMFAWD" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1999695ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1999695" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528157">OHLAWDTOMFAWD</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-12">12/12/23 16:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got a sample. Love the opening, honestly dont like where it goes after that.<br />
<br />
I do see the comparisons to BR540. It does have this mineralistic tinge that 540 has. Of course oud is present here and is palatable. However the earthy, almost mossy edge and mineralistic bite on it just jump out to my nose and I dont particularly care for that element of it combined with the other notes. The mossyness does fade in the deep drydown, but the minerality stays.<br />
<br />
Great perfumery I think, for what its worth. Just not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1999695"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1999695#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1999678" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1999678" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MatRcasanova"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1924798"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MatRcasanova" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1999678ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1999678" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1924798">MatRcasanova</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-12">12/12/23 16:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume is an exceptional addition to my collection. From the first time I used a decant, every spray has been an experience in itself. It's not just a fragrance; it adds character, seductive power, mystery, and elegance. It strikes a perfect balance between modern and classic. I even prefer it to TF Oud Wood, which is another favorite of mine.<br />
<br />
Ideal for nights out, whether it's to a club or a formal event. Wearing this perfume, you're sure to be noticed. It's a true masterpiece in perfumery, unforgettable with every use</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1999678"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1999678#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1997337" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1997337" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ysads"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1799235"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1799235.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ysads" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Tonka-25-51697.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51697.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tonka 25"title="Tonka 25"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1997337ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1997337" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1799235">ysads</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-09">12/09/23 22:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening for me smells a lot like a delicious cardamom and nutmeg bun. It's sweet and intense, the kind that steals your attention and prevents you from thinking about something else.<br />
<br />
I didn't love it at first, because I thought it was a bit too sweet and noticeable, but after a few sprays I fell in love with it. To me it's still uncomfortable to know that other people WILL smell it, but I think I can control that by wearing less sprays.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1997337"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1997337#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1997218" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1997218" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="boogidybangpow"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1335612"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="boogidybangpow" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mercedes-Benz/Mercedes-Benz-Club-Black-46797.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46797.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mercedes Benz Club Black"title="Mercedes Benz Club Black"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1997218ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1997218" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1335612">boogidybangpow</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-09">12/09/23 18:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think that this fragrance is more for a seasoned gentleman. One who is 40+ and wears suits a lot. I find that the fragrance was quite boring but not in a bad way...lol. It's a good type of boring, but its not for me. I was wearing it this evening at a restaurant and i noticed the woman who was about 4 feet away from me was covering her nose. lol. That's all i needed to know. Go light on the trigger fellas. I could see this being worn during the winter at church, or maybe the office, or a night on the town, but this is not an everyday fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I felt a confidence boost exude from me.<br />
