padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1994966" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nicholas Seian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874345"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1874345.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nicholas Seian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Salvador-Dali/Voyage-Onirique-Du-Papillon-De-Vie-35411.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.35411.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Voyage Onirique Du Papillon De Vie"title="Voyage Onirique Du Papillon De Vie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1994966ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1994966" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874345">Nicholas Seian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-07">12/07/23 07:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The saffron and oud blend well! I prefer this over Baccarat Rouge 540</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1994966"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1994966#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1994257" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1994257" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gedlive"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/866522"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.866522.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gedlive" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Equipage-7.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Equipage"title="Equipage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1994257ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1994257" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/866522">gedlive</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-06">12/06/23 13:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got this free sample thrown in with an order.<br />
I heard the hype, so I was thankful to try this.<br />
<br />
It's a well blended, strong synthetic oud and peppery spiciness.<br />
The peppery spice is the nutmeg I guess.<br />
It's dark and spicy, but smooth and warm and enjoyable. It's mature. It's a little more dangerous that safe ouds like Tom Ford Oud Wood.<br />
It very much reminds me of Xerjoff Zafar. This is softer or smoother than Zafar, a little less peppery, with a warm spiciness.<br />
<br />
At this price point, $300+, I would recommend a Bornikoff Oud. He uses beautiful genuine ouds, while the oud here is synthetic.<br />
Oud Maximus, Lao Oud or Mysterious Oud by Bortnikoff.<br />
This has a nice aromatic spiciness. Bortnikoff uses more florals. But Lao Oud or Mysterious Oud have less florals, more spiciness.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1994257"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1994257#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1990947" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1990947" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SouthernSwagger3182"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1350064"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SouthernSwagger3182" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Tobacco-Honey-84518.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84518.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Honey"title="Tobacco Honey"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1990947ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1990947" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1350064">SouthernSwagger3182</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-02">12/02/23 17:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So finally got a bottle in. Have sampled at Saks and had a few samples. Ive heard people say its been reformulated. I will say this. I have a 2022 batch and its no slouch. First 2 hrs with 4-5 sprays was pretty loud and heavy. Saffron and dry woods is what I get. This is a bosses fragrance. It leans masculine. I could see a woman pulling it off but a certain type of woman. After 5hrs and a few games of basketball my kids still said it was going strong. Id say this gets about 10-12 hrs+ longevity and if the wind is blowing people will for sure smell you.  This one screams confidence and success. This is a fragrance that every man should have if they have a collection imo. This shines in cooler/colder weather and I can see this being a signature scent. In the summer 1 spray will suffice but wouldnt wear  if mainly outside but this is a Swiss pocket knife. Good for almost any occasion.<br />
<br />
Update<br />
So I applied a spray on the back of each hand just to test the new bottle about 3 hrs ago. My wife just came in the room and said Im strong from the door. Two sprays filled the room 3 hrs later. Got to be careful with this one. This is one you can easily find for around $200</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1990947"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1990947#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1990862" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1990862" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="elnurnamazov969"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1913048"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="elnurnamazov969" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1990862ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1990862" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1913048">elnurnamazov969</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-02">12/02/23 15:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In the realm of scents, a tale unfolds,<br />
Oud for Greatness by Initio, a story told.<br />
A fragrance bold, an essence rare,<br />
A journey through time, a regal affair.<br />
<br />
From distant lands where legends rise,<br />
Oud emerges, a noble prize.<br />
In every drop, greatness concealed,<br />
A fragrant symphony, power revealed.<br />
<br />
A resinous dance, rich and deep,<br />
Initio's creation, secrets to keep.<br />
Oud whispers tales of ancient might,<br />
A fragrant ode to the starry night.<br />
<br />
Bergamot sparkles in the top note's gleam,<br />
A citrus burst, a radiant dream.<br />
Yet, beneath the zesty, a dark embrace,<br />
Oud unfurls, a scent of grace.<br />
<br />
Patchouli weaves a mystical thread,<br />
A tapestry of scents, like dreams widespread.<br />
Amber and leather, a sensual blend,<br />
Oud for Greatness, a fragrance to transcend.<br />
<br />
As the scent lingers on the noble skin,<br />
A trail of greatness, a journey within.<br />
Initio's creation, a masterpiece rare,<br />
Oud for Greatness, beyond compare.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1990862"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1990862#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1988148" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1988148" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="POTFORTY2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657706"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="POTFORTY2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1988148ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1988148" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657706">POTFORTY2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-29">11/29/23 08:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the best things Ive smelled. I dont like Oud for Glory but believe if it smelled 10% better Id love it so I blind bought a partial of Oud for Greatness and while Ill say theyre close the extra 10% of improvement does go a LONG ways with this scent profile. Oud for Glory oddly smells like Oud for Greatness with a vodka note I never noticed unless I put them side by side and it sort of ruins the entire composition. Oud for Greatness comes off a lot smoother. I think OFG is mass appealing so Im surprised to read people say its not office friendly - I think its easy to love as long as its not oversprayed I find it smelling more versatile than I imagined. Its also more light and airy than I imagined. <br />
<br />
It has quickly become one of my favorite cooler weather scents ever and I didnt even like Oud for Glory. I will always keep this as a collection staple.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1988148"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1988148#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1988000" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Outstanding performance. Just wow </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1985459"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1985459#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1983530" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1983530" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Charlemagnes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1902953"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1902953.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Charlemagnes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1983530ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1983530" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); I have very little experience with perfumes, notes, anything like that. I buy samples of scents based on their descriptions and I found this one to be enchanting through that lone.<br />
<br />
The sample is wild. It's spicy, smooth, warm, and predatory. <br />
<br />
I liken it to being invited into Hannibal Lecter's (Mads Mikkelsen, television Hannibal) psychiatry office on a dark, rainy evening. Among other things.<br />
<br />
Very intense, very solid, ever present.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1983530"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1983530#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1981443" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1981443" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="akshat_dudeja"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705078"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1705078.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="akshat_dudeja" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Noir-de-Noir-1822.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1822.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Noir de Noir"title="Noir de Noir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1981443ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1981443" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705078">akshat_dudeja</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-20">11/20/23 21:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I must say, the fragrance and the overall performance is out of the world and I give this perfume 10/10. Just wanna be honest with ya'll, wear this only for special occasions. This one smells similar to BR540, and for a very long time I had been using it. Br540 is also a massive compliment getter and a smooth luxurious fragrance, and I've absolutely adored it from the very beginning, but the reality is I got bored after almost a year of wearing it. Initio Oud for Greatness was a blind buy, and although I had already heard people saying it has the br540 DNA, I was still excited to receive my bottle of oud for greatness simply because I love to appreciate perfumes as pure artwork. When I received it and started wearing it, I still got loads of compliments, but I personally got bored of this particular burnt sugar scent. So again gonna say this, I loved both br540 and initio oud for Greatness but I'd still suggest everyone to keep such scents for special occasions only, as these really are some great masterpieces but if you'd wear this frequently you'll eventually get bored of the scent and will lose the very ability to appreciate the beauty of either of these perfumes. <br />
<br />
Another pro tip: if you can spend a lil more, then go for br540 extrait, that's the best perfume you can get with the same dna(without considering price as a factor, although both the br450 as well as this initio might be a bit pricey for some people)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Your review (and any other too, from what I saw) screams AI made. Painful to read.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1979973"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1979973#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1979548" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1979548" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ninjandrew"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1642457"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1642457.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="ninjandrew" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/DS-Durga/Bowmakers-22058.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.22058.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bowmakers"title="Bowmakers"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1979548ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1979548" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1642457">ninjandrew</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-18">11/18/23 10:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just tried it. Quite liked it at first - I was able to pick out all of the notes except the musk until the drydown, which for me is where this one loses all its appeal. The musk is a peppery sort of animalic funk. It was actually quite distracting. Whatever the mysterious stinky note is, I've also smelled it in BR540, but without having to wait for the drydown and honestly, it was even worse in BR540. Don't blind buy this one!<br />
<br />
Edit: Haltane to Oud for Greatness quick comparison - I can definitely see the resemblance, but with haltane being slightly sweeter, a bit more aromatic and a stronger saffron note, whereas oud for greatness has a slightly stronger oud note.<br />
<br />
OfG strength is the patchouli/nutmeg/musk combination (until drydown reveals the musks animalic funk). Haltane strength is the aromatic saffron/oud combination.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1979548"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1979548#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1977789" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1977789" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JosephFragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1689650"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1689650.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JosephFragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1977789ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1977789" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1689650">JosephFragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-16">11/16/23 03:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A Masterpiece Defying Critics<br />
<br />
Initio Oud for Greatness is nothing short of a masterpiece in the world of fragrances. From the moment the first spritz graces your skin, you are transported into a realm of unparalleled luxury and sophistication.<br />
<br />
The star of the show is undoubtedly the oud, and Initio has managed to capture its essence in a way that is both bold and refined. The woody richness is complemented by subtle nuances of sweetness, creating a fragrance that is simultaneously commanding and alluring.<br />
<br />
What's truly perplexing is the criticism this fragrance has received. Oud for Greatness stands as a testament to the artistry of perfumery, and it's disheartening to see some dismiss it without giving it a fair chance. The longevity is impressive, lingering on the skin for hours, a testament to the quality of the ingredients and the craftsmanship behind its creation.<br />
<br />
The bottle itself is a work of art, a reflection of the opulence contained within. The attention to detail is evident, from the sleek design to the magnetic cap that adds a touch of practical elegance.<br />
<br />
For those who appreciate the complexity of oud-based fragrances, Oud for Greatness is a must-try. It's a scent that evolves beautifully over time, revealing different facets with each passing hour. The interplay of notes creates a symphony that is both unique and unforgettable.<br />
<br />
In conclusion, the negative reviews on Oud for Greatness are confounding. This fragrance deserves to be celebrated for its boldness, its complexity, and its ability to transport the wearer to a world of timeless elegance. Don't let the naysayers deter you; experience it for yourself and let the scent speak for its unparalleled greatness.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1977789"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1977789#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1976499" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1976499" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Niazi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/899581"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.899581.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Niazi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53641.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud for Greatness"title="Oud for Greatness"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1976499ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1976499" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/899581">Niazi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-14">11/14/23 09:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is one of the best woody scents ever created. From start till the Dry down I keep sniffing my arm. It's almost addictive....</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1976499"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1976499#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1975544" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1975544" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JusttheFactsMan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1733487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JusttheFactsMan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bois-1920/Itruk-32129.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32129.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Itruk"title="Itruk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1975544ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1975544" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487">JusttheFactsMan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-13">11/13/23 06:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>#408 in my "Tour de Fragrance"<br />
<br />
Last week I ordered this sample. I already have Bade'e Al Oud for Glory, which everyone said was a dupe of this Initio fragrance. The Lattafa frag, for me, was reminiscent of Haltane, but clearly from the bottle design and names Lattafa was trying for a dupe of Initio Oud for Greatness. Now I have actually done a true side-by-side.<br />
<br />
First of all, both great fragrances that any oud lover would be pleased to own, and at $23 you'd be foolish not to give the Lattafa dupe a shot.  The notes are apparently all the same. The scents are close, but they are not identical. The agarwood (oud) in the Initio is much woodier, richer, unquestionably more potent in projection and longevity, and I don't think it's just the amount in use because it smells very different. <br />
<br />
There are in fact six different types of oud used by perfumers and I'm certain that Lattafa and Initio are using different types. I have no experience to tell me which is which. Oudimentary sells a sampler pack with all six raw ouds for $75 that I may get around to after the first of the year (I've blown all the cash on this hobby that I can spare for this year). But  the notes here on Fragrantica don't specify. I don't know if the notes from the fragrance houses distinguish which type of oud you are getting. Without that detail it won't help me in ordering a fragrance with the Agarwood I prefer, and I most definitely prefer the oud in Initio Oud for Greatness. Hands down, No contest. But you may have a completely different preference. I think for most people it's not a difference we'll niggle over when one is $23 and the other is $300 and up. I'm content to stick with the Bade'e Al Oud for Glory, for now. But I would say Initio Oud for Greatness is the better fragrance, at least the one I prefer, and I certainly know it's the one I'd be more delighted by as a gift. <br />
<br />
I would only wear this in cold weather. It's not a roaring beast, but it's not for the weak, so not for carpools, elevators, other closed spaces or office use. Projection falls off after the first hour and the skin scent is down to a hint at six hours. I would probably save this for dates, really important ones, and I would have the brass (you may not) to wear this to formal events where you mingle, not where someone is forced to sit next to you for an entire performance of some kind, unless you just want to torment them and make them talk about you in a bad way after. ; ) Oh, and this is not remotely unisex. At least not in Western culture. Very masculine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1975544"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1975544#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1975025" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The scent is a 7/10 and this is not a fragrance that I would recommend checking out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1967291"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1967291#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1966665" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I got a new batch and dam it is strong to me I wouldn't want it any stronger cause I don't like real strong fragrance can't enjoy that but oud for Greatness is perfect love it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1964349" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="orangelips11"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407366"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1407366.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="orangelips11" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Noir-de-Noir-1822.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1822.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Noir de Noir"title="Noir de Noir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1964349ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1964349" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); <br />
I give OFG, 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1964349"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1964349#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1963623" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Nice perfume though.<br />
<br />
Seriously, 0% oud.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1963623"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1963623#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1963134" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1963134" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="timjaeger"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1870292"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1870292.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="timjaeger" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1963134ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1963134" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); Decent sillage, good (not great) longevity and a complex, non linear scent make this one to wear for Fall and early spring evenings.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1963134"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1963134#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1961154" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1961154" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fwanak"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874822"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1874822.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fwanak" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-9828.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9828.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus"title="Aventus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1961154ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1961154" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874822">fwanak</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-26">10/26/23 02:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you spray it close, the scent is so strong that you can't put your nose close to it.<br />
It's very burdensome.<br />
<br />
However, the scent that emerges after 2-3 hours is very attractive.<br />
<br />
The first scent is overwhelming so I feel uncomfortable spraying it, but considering the lingering scent, it is a scent that is too difficult for me personally to want to spray.<br />
<br />
If the price were a little cheaper, I would highly recommend it, but due to import taxes from overseas, it is expensive to match the luxurious scent, so it is difficult to recommend it to people who cannot buy it cheaply.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1961154"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1961154#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="53641" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1033882" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1033882" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JonnyRedScents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1175490"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1175490.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JonnyRedScents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Ani-54785.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54785.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ani"title="Ani"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1033882ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1033882" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1175490">JonnyRedScents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-02-21">02/21/19 11:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Am I the first review here? Noice! Let me just say this fragrance is pure magic. I recently smelled quite a few fragrances at Osswald in NYC, and for me, this was the star. Of course it was sold out. I managed to walk away with only a sample, but it has now become my mission to acquire a full bottle. <br />
<br />
The opening is nice, but just wait a few minutes and the real magic begins. I have never smelled a smoother oud in my life. It is no way cloying or pungent. It's relaxing and addicting. And the patchouli/musk dry down is what perfume dreams are made of. The drydown is almost similar to my fave Aventus due to the shared patchouli and musk notes.<br />
<br />
This scent somehow captures everything I love about fragrances in a single bottle. It's fresh. It's semi sweet. It's woody. Its spicy. It's blended to perfection. The bottle is beautiful. It lasts forever. Over 24 hours for me and I also still smell it strongly on my jacket 3 days later. The projection is not beastly, but it does project arms length for a good part of the day. I can't wait to own this one...<br />
<br />
QUICK EDIT: If youre the type who detects and detests a doctors office note in BR540, you may not enjoy this fragrance. It does share a similar vibe that I forgot to mention.<br />
<br />
LESS QUICK EDIT: I am appalled by so many of these negative reviews. Reading all these reminds me immediately of why Fragrantica gets a bad wrap quite often in the fragrance community. A lot of amateur noses on here for sure. This is a solid scent and doesnt deserve the ignorant reviews its received. As always, try before you buy and do not trust what you read until you actually do try for yourself.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1033882"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1033882#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1507831" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1507831" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BennyIvansson"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1462115"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1462115.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BennyIvansson" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1507831ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1507831" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1462115">BennyIvansson</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-19">02/19/22 13:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What does it smell like?<br />
<br />
Spicy/sweet/smokey/oudy. <br />
<br />
Notes are lavender, saffron, nutmeg, oud, patchouli, musk.<br />
<br />
Yeah, I know, but how does it smell?<br />
<br />
Let me put it this way:<br />
<br />
Gucci Guilty Absolute: bold, aggressive, assertive and confident in a very expressive, manly way. Woody, smokey, leathery and masculine smell. Sweat, muscles, defined body, rough, dominant sex. A CEO of a big multibillion dollar company, always well dressed, always in charge, always leaving a trail where people instantly realize that he cannot he questioned. Raw, decisive masculinity in a bottle.<br />
<br />
Oud For Greatness: you own the company, the office building and the entire block. You never mention it. When you visit the company and the CEO is approaching you to kiss your ass, you shush him without looking at him because you're listening to the janitor who's telling you how her family is doing.<br />
<br />
Performance<br />
<br />
A single spray will by many people be perceived as strong and "too much" within the 1-2 first hours. I have bottled it in smaller containers, so that I can dab very small amounts, literally half of a droplet, behind my ears and on my neck. These very small dabs will project and act as a normal strong perfume for 8-10 hours. I dabbed the back of my ears 11 hours ago together with Vaseline and it still smells when I walk around.<br />
<br />
On clothing, especially winter wool jackets, if sprayed richly, it will project strongly for over a month. The trail will be there for even longer. <br />
<br />
Price<br />
<br />
People on this website seem to call every expensive perfume "overpriced" no matter the quality or the performance. Sorry but I don't like this way of reasoning. If a perfume performs well and is well blended, it's not overpriced just because it didn't meet your expectations regarding the smell. Your personal opinion has really nothing to do with determining its value. <br />
<br />
If you don't like the smell, you shouldn't use Oud For Greatness even if you got paid for doing so, because you will not get rid of the smell for many hours.<br />
<br />
The price tag on this is high. 250+ EUR. Depending on your income and your personal taste, that may be too much. But it's technically wrong to call it overpriced since it's very well blended with real raw materials. This will perform better than the majority of your current perfumes. <br />
<br />
This smell cannot, I repeat, cannot be replicated for under 150 EUR. Anyone claiming to have a cheap copy of this with equal smell and equal performance is lying. Unless they bought it from a perfume house that plans to bankrupt themselves. Raw materials are expensive. This perfume may have a price tag that is a little bit over what they usually cost. But smell it! It's insane! If you like it and you can afford it, buy it. It's worth it. It will last for a very long time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1507831"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1507831#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1127731" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1127731" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dennispetrospour"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1187792"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1187792.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dennispetrospour" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1127731ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1127731" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1187792">dennispetrospour</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-12-25">12/25/19 18:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Blind bought this for Christmas. Jeez this scent is so good. It smells like it's ultra high quality. Starts off oudy then gets sweet and smooooooth.  Very strong smelling and lasts for ever. 5 star scent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1127731"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1127731#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1773300" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1773300" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="miket67"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1606210"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1606210.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="miket67" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Spicebomb-Infrared-66514.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66514.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spicebomb Infrared"title="Spicebomb Infrared"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1773300ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1773300" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1606210">miket67</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-02">03/02/23 13:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Too much gives me a headache.<br />
Just the right amount makes me feel like sipping ambrosia from the skulls of my crushed enemies while I seize their lands, and listen to the laments of their women.<br />
Epic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1773300"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1773300#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1417172" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1417172" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Roozy85"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1279480"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1279480.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Roozy85" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Le-Parfum-61856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Le Parfum"title="Le Male Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1417172ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1417172" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1279480">Roozy85</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-26">09/26/21 02:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'll do it short and simple.<br />
Scent: holy shitttt this is so God damn amazing. <br />
<br />
Quality: fuckin fantastic.<br />
<br />
Performance: you know beast mode, well fuck that. If a T-rex wanted a great signature scents, this would be it.<br />
<br />
Price: good lord, I better start putting one of my kidneys for sale on ebay.<br />
<br />
Conclusion: I mean, if you really don't know my take on it based on my professional review, than you need to see a shrink ASAP</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1417172"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1417172#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="53641" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1293898" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1293898" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scottpiper"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1043328"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1043328.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="scottpiper" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Smoking-Hot-84413.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84413.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Smoking Hot"title="Smoking Hot"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1293898ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1293898" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1043328">scottpiper</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-16">02/16/21 21:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its really a shame that honesty goes unappreciated by a handful of users (especially for this perfume) and unfavourable reviews get downvoted and eventually removed.<br />
<br />
Ive been wearing Oud for Greatness by Initio Parfums Privs for over a year now and I still dont understand the hype about it, nor its appeal.<br />
<br />
It says on the carded sample, highly concentrated with the worlds finest natural oud oil.<br />
<br />
I have a very difficult time believing that.  Its US$380 retail price for 90 mL suggests that, but dont be fooled.<br />
<br />
This is very, very dry and peppery throughout the entire wearing; mainly a heavy dose of that saffron accord and patchouli in the drydown.  I do not get any lavender or any oud wood or agar wood oil as described on the website.<br />
<br />
The performance is insane; 18+ hours from two light sprays on my neck and it barely came off with heavy scrubbing in a hot shower.  It also throws a long, long way!  It easily fills a bedroom or living room, so be prepared to garner some attention.  This is also one of those types of perfumes that lingers for a while wherever youve been, so go easy on your initial application.<br />
<br />
Ive heard many comparisons to BR 540 but I dont see it.  Sure, they both feature a prominent saffron accord, but thats it.  This has zero sweetness to it and no amber wood accord, unlike BR 540.<br />
<br />
Ultimately, I was disappointed with this one.  Its far too dry up top and takes forever to get to the drydown where its more enjoyable to me.  I also find its versatility limited due to how loudly it wears indoors.  Its retail price is absurd and prohibitive, although it is widely available at discounters for less.<br />
<br />
I strongly recommend sampling this one, although finding official carded samples from Initio Parfums Privs can be difficult and expensive when you do.<br />
<br />
Please, dont let a written review here or YouTube hype influence your enjoyment of the journey.  Let your brain/nose be the ultimate judge in deciding what you purchase!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53641"comment_id="1293898"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html?ccid=1293898#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1191568" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1191568" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="discardedandroid"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1239217"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1239217.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="discardedandroid" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1191568ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1191568" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);
